summary: This mod add\'s a HUGE mansion in a custom worldspace.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Draten Tower
Version: 1.0
Date: 
Category: Buildings
Author(s): 
Source: http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=8440

Description
===========
This mod adds a HUGE Mansion full of things to the world of Skyrim.

Location
========
The entrance is in the woods somewhere ;p It\'s marked on a map. It\'s a huge tower on a mountain, so you\'ll not miss it.

Details
=======
This tower has pool,library,one owner bedroom,two quest\'s bedrooms, kitchen, armory, a balcony, and a garden.

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
3. Start Oblivion Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.



Incompatibility
===============
Currently none discovered.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None found. If you find any, tell me.

History
=======
1.0.0 - Initial Realease.

Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as \'DimentionalAlice\'
You can send me an email here: hatsunemikutan@gmail.com

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to NexusMods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to Me for creating this mod ^-^

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
author: DimentionalAlice
